mapper.select: select count(*) from chat_room where member_id = #{memberRoom}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_detail (chat_room, section, role, sender, chat_detail) values (#{memberRoom}, #{section}, #{role}, #{sender}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from chat_detail where chat_room =#{memberRoom} and section ='member' order by chat_time asc

SELECT og.chat_room, og.chat_time, og.chat_detail FROM chat_detail og INNER JOIN ( SELECT chat_room, MAX(chat_time) AS max_chat_time FROM chat_detail where role = 'member' GROUP BY chat_room ) latest_chat ON og.chat_room = latest_chat.chat_room AND og.chat_time = latest_chat.max_chat_time ORDER BY og.chat_time DESC
